import React from "react"; import "../styles/lastMovies.scss"; import moment from 'moment' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function LastMovies() { return (

Latest Movies

{movies.map((movie) => (

{movie.title}

IMDb {movie.rating}

{movie.description} ..more

{moment(movie.release).format('MMMM d yyyy')}

))}
); }
